text: Paula Prentiss (born March 4, 1938) is an American movie and television series actress. She first became famous in the 1960s. She played Bobbie Markowe in the 1975 movie version of The Stepford Wives. She played a maternity nurse in the 1996 movie Mrs. Winterbourne. Prentiss was born in San Antonio, Texas. title: Paula Prentiss
